entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
